Name: Nutty Nashville
Ingredients: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Bourbon and hazelnut smoothed and rounded by honey and egg white (the egg white is my own contribution).
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2001 by Jason Fendick at The Rockwell in the Trafalgar Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Nutty Nashville contains 278 calories
